title: Ford launches apps which allows drivers to remotely control door locks
text:
#Ford Ford launches apps which allows drivers to remotely control door locks The apps are only for Ford's electric and plug-in hybrid models. Also, the watch apps can read out battery range and charging status. ANI | 18 September 2015, 8:42 AM IST 
WASHINGTON DC: American automaker Ford has updated its MyFord Mobile app on Android and iOS. 
According to the Verge, the app now features remote climate control, lock and unlock, mileage, and walking directions for finding the users car, among other things. 
The apps are only for Ford's electric and plug-in hybrid models. Also, the watch apps can read out battery range and charging status. 
The users, who drive one of those models and either an Apple Watch or Android Wear smartwatch, can download the app right now.
